short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Avoid dangerous Google Translations in ASANA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Translate translate all text in ASANA page.
So, all autosave inputfield are automatically saved with the translated text.
This extension avoid this behaviour, preserving input content from being translated.
